WorkItem.Description:
Hunter's Marksmanship tree Talent skill Readiness is not used correctly in the Details calculation tab. The skill resets all the Hunter skills, except Bestial Mastery's Bestial Wrath, meaning I can double shot any priority rotation skills. The way Rawr calculates it today is to use it immediately after other skills, not considering the previous skills "up timers".
Â 
For example, Rapid Fire lasts 15 seconds after activated. The current model today activates Readiness immediately, wasting those 15 seconds.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] MM Talent Readiness modeling is not right

Readiness should be used after Rapid Fire duration fades away, which is a good 15 seconds after. Also I usually wait until boss goes 20% to do Kill Shot, Readiness, Kill Shot.

The reason Readiness never activates is you put it after Steady, which is a spammable shot and will always be available.  That's why I said to put if after everything BUT Steady ;P

Also, you're incorrect on using Readiness after Rapid Fire buff fades.  You want to use it as soon as you can after Rapid Fire, whether immediately or after all your shots are on cooldown and Rapid Fire is still going.  Using Readiness won't remove the Rapid Fire buff, it only resets the cooldown, so doing it the way you're saying is causing you to lose 9 seconds before you can use Rapid Fire the 3rd time.  I myself have it all in one macro:
#showtooltip Rapid Fire
/cast [combat] Call of the Wild    *Always keep this from autofiring
/cast [combat] Rapid Fire
/cast [combat] Readiness

This way I hit it once after my aimed and then a second time to activate Rapid Fire again after the buff runs out for 30 continous seconds of Rapid Fire.  There's no dps difference between using Rapid Fire at the beginning or using it after Aimed.
